thread.title: Watch List 2
thread.title_full: Watch List for Oct. 2 - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Watch List 2
text:
FRIDAY’S LIVE EVENTS
Horse Racing
• Batavia Downs, 6:35 p.m.
NHL Preseason
• Columbus at Buffalo, 7 p.m., First Niagara Center.
